name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Ameer BEST, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Ameer BEST, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of August, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File Cross-Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. As counsel represents the Cross-Petition for Allowance of Appeal is prepared, counsel is directed to file it within 10 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
52 A.3d 218
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Ameer BEST, Petitioner.
No. 83 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 27, 2012.
